resources.string:
About:
 This simple app will return all color information available in the source code of any desired website. Please note this will not return all colors found on a webpage, only the publicly available colors from the page source.
 This app works by pulling the source code into a bufferReader, the buffer is searched for any instances of a hexadecimal value matching that of a color value. A list of unique colors is then returned.

 How to Use:
 Enter your desired URL. Press the search button when ready. When the list of colors is returned, simple tap on any color to copy the hexadecimal value to your clipboard. The color will also be saved in your Saved Colors menu.
 To resave the hexadecimal value to your clipboard, again tap the desired color. If you wish to delete a color from your Saved Colors menu, press and hold.

 (Note: Please make sure you have a stable internet connection. If an Invalid URL message is displayed, please make sure you have entered the correct protocol, domain and resource.
